question_text: "I bought my new coat from the bazar yesterday." The correct reported speech form of the sentence above is ………………………

choices.A: Maha told me that she had bought her new coat from the bazar the day before.
choices.B: Maha told me that she has bought my new coat from the bazar the day before.
choices.C: Maha told me that I had bought her new coat from the bazar the day before.
choices.D: Maha told me that she had bought my new coat from the bazar that day.
